name: Post Haste
description:
Pickup packages from the depot in your flying van and deliver them to the correct houses. Make as many deliveries as you can before time runs out!

This game was created at Global Game Jam 2016, go to here
to see more info. We really enjoyed making this game and hope you enjoy playing it!

Credits:
Jonathan Bryant (Designer)
Amethyst Costello (Artist)
Callum Neideck (Programmer)
Dimitri Sarkatzis (Designer)
